Summary report for DAB051 and DAB052 libraries.

```{r setup_chunk}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)

source("./custom_functions.R")
```


```{r}
#add genotypes to "data" folder and go on.
proj <- "DAB073"
genotypes <- sprintf("./%s/results/%s_genotypes.txt", proj, proj)  
xy1 <- fread(genotypes, stringsAsFactors = FALSE,
             colClasses = list(character = c(1, 4, 5, 7, 9, 11, 12),
                               numeric = c(2, 3, 6)))
showSumsByLibrary(xy1, loc = "./DAB073/results/", pos = "by_sample")
```
